tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE transaction_logs(
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    description TEXT,
    robot_id INT,
    task_id INT,
    success BOOLEAN,
    CONSTRAINT fk_robot FOREIGN KEY (robot_id) REFERENCES robots(robot_id),
    CONSTRAINT fk_task FOREIGN KEY (task_id) REFERENCES tasks(task_id)
)

CREATE TABLE audit_trails (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT,
  action VARCHAR(50),
  timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  details TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE transaction_logs (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    action VARCHAR(255),
    robot_id INT,
    result VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE audit_trails (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    action VARCHAR(255),
    user_id INT,
    description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE transaction_logs (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    transaction_time TIMESTAMP,
    activity VARCHAR(100),
    robot_id UUID,
    user_id UUID
);

CREATE TABLE audit_trails (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    event_time TIMESTAMP,
    event_description TEXT,
    user_id UUID,
    robot_id UUID
);

CREATE TABLE rpa_task_logs (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    task_name VARCHAR(100),
    status VARCHAR(50),
    start_time TIMESTAMP,
    end_time TIMESTAMP
);
